body:
Thank you Chris!



I would like to take this opportunity to acknowledge the support I received from great members of this community. Over the course of several past months, I have had the pleasure of interacting with [Mostapha Sadeghipour Roudsari](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/profile/MostaphaSadeghipour?xg_source=activity), [Chris Mackey](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/profile/ChrisMackey), [Abraham Yezioro](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/profile/AbrahamYezioro?xg_source=activity), [Djordje Spasic](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/profile/djordje), [Antonello Di Nunzio](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/profile/AntonelloDiNunzio), [Francesco De Luca](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/profile/FrancescoDeLuca?xg_source=profiles_friendList), and [Sarith Subramaniam ](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/profile/sarith?xg_source=profiles_friendList)on several different platforms. I thank you all for the inspiration, intellectual stimulation, feedback, and time.



I congratulate all the other members of the development team. You all are a constant source of inspiration. Many congratulations to Byron Mardas as well!



Thank you all!
